decks.notes: The main concept of this deck is to quickly reduce your own life total in order to make Death's Shadow a powerful threat on the battlefield. Utilizing cards like Thoughtseize, Fatal Push, and Lightning Bolt to disrupt your opponent's game plan while simultaneously pumping up your Death's Shadow, this deck aims to pressure your opponent with aggressive plays and efficient removal. Mishra's Bauble and Expressive Iteration provide card selection and advantage, while Stubborn Denial offers protection for your threats. Psychic Frog and Dragon's Rage Channeler help maintain card advantage and filter through your deck, ensuring you are always a step ahead of your opponent.

The main focus of this Boros Aggro deck is to establish a strong board presence with efficient creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury, supported by removal spells like Galvanic Discharge and Thraben Charm. The deck also utilizes cards like Ajani, Nacatl Pariah and Arena of Glory to pump up its creatures and push for damage. Additionally, the inclusion of Goblin Bombardment allows for additional reach and flexibility in dealing damage to the opponent. The deck aims to pressure the opponent early and close out the game quickly with its aggressive strategy.

The deck focuses on combining powerful creatures such as Allosaurus Rider with cards like Neoform and Eldritch Evolution to quickly assemble a lethal board state. By tutoring for key combo pieces using cards like Glittering Wish and Eladamri's Call, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with big threats like Ghalta, Stampede Tyrant and Xenagos, God of Revels. Utilizing Gemstone Mine and Windswept Heath for mana acceleration, the deck aims to win the game quickly through an explosive combination of creatures and powerful spells.

Utilizing cheap discard spells and self-mill to quickly deploy threats like Hollow One and Vengevine, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and aggressive game plan. By efficiently filling the graveyard with creatures and benefiting from cards like Flameblade Adept, the deck can quickly outpace opponents and close out games before they have a chance to stabilize. The inclusion of cards like Kiora, the Rising Tide and Ox of Agonas provide additional value and card advantage to continue pushing for victory.

This deck focuses on quickly milling the opponent's library to win the game. By using cards like Hedron Crab, Ruin Crab, and Fractured Sanity, the deck aims to fill up the opponent's graveyard while triggering powerful effects like Archive Trap and Tasha's Hideous Laughter. Combining mill spells with removal like Fatal Push and Drown in the Loch helps control the board while also advancing the mill strategy. The deck also includes cards like Surgical Extraction and Crypt Incursion to disrupt the opponent's strategy and protect itself. Ultimately, the goal is to mill the opponent out of cards and win the game through a deck-out victory.

The main concept of this deck is to utilize cards that allow for creative and unexpected combos to be generated, such as Indomitable Creativity and Fable of the Mirror-Breaker. By combining cards like Persist and Archon of Cruelty, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's strategy while building a powerful board presence. Additionally, cards like Thoughtseize and Fatal Push provide control and removal options, while cards like Wrenn and Six offer recurring value. The deck focuses on surprising the opponent and controlling the game through creative synergies and combos.

The deck focuses on generating value and aggression through sacrificing creatures to pump up Blade of the Bloodchief, while also utilizing Eldrazi creatures and Kozilek's Command to control the board. The key strategy is to develop a strong board presence with Basking Broodscale and Glaring Fleshraker, while disrupting the opponent with Malevolent Rumble and Boseiju, Who Endures. By combining combo pieces like Sephiroth, Fabled SOLDIER and Emrakul, the Promised End, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent and secure victory through a combination of aggressive creatures and disruptive spells.

The main idea of this deck is to disrupt your opponent's strategy while generating value through card advantage and tempo plays. This is achieved by using cards like Sink into Stupor and Flare of Denial to control the game while also deploying efficient creatures like Ice-Fang Coatl and Shardless Agent to pressure the opponent. Cards like Birthing Ritual and Aether Channeler provide additional mana acceleration to help cast powerful spells quickly. The deck has a mix of disruptiveness and aggression to keep the opponent off-balance and ultimately secure victory.
